Code ReactJs sau khi build th√¨ c≈©ng l√† nh·ªØng static files n√™n m√¨nh vi·∫øt ph·∫ßn build ·ªü Github Actions v√† upload nh·ªØng file tƒ©nh ƒë√≥ l√™n Cloud Storage.

Sau khi t·∫°o LB xong s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c c·∫•p m·ªôt IP, c√¥ng vi·ªác ti·∫øp theo l√† v√†o CloudFlare tr·ªè domain FE v√†o IP n√†y (easy game üòé).

    name: ReactJs Deploy

on:
    push:
        branches:
            - develop
    pull_request:
        branches:
            - develop

jobs:
    build:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        steps:
            - uses: actions/checkout@v2

            - name: Setup Node.js # setup Node.js in the runner
            uses: actions/setup-node@v1
            with:
                node-version: "12"
            - uses: actions/cache@v2
            with:
                path: ~/.npm
                key: ${{ runner.os }}-node-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
                restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-node-
            - run: npm ci # install dependencies
            - run: npm run build --if-present # build the project
            # - run: npm run test:unit # run the tests

            - name: Setup - gcloud / gsutil
            uses: google-github-actions/setup-gcloud@master
            with:
                service_account_key: ${{ secrets.GCS_SA_KEY }}
                project_id: ${{ secrets.GCS_PROJECT }}
                export_default_credentials: true

            - name: Deploy static site to GS bucket
            run: |-
                gsutil -m rsync -r build gs://${{ secrets.GCS_BUCKET }}

Back End

  • GCP services: Compute Instance, Cloud SQL
  • ƒê·ªëi v·ªõi ph·∫ßn code backend, c·ª• th·ªÉ l√† Laravel, m√¨nh ch·ªçn deploy l√™n m·ªôt Virtual Machine (VM) v·ªõi setup Nginx + PHP + Composer.
  • Database th√¨ m√¨nh d√πng Cloud SQL ƒë·ªÉ ch·∫°y ri√™ng m·ªôt MySQL server, gi·∫£m t·∫£i ph·∫ßn x·ª≠ l√Ω DB cho server backend ·ªü tr√™n.

  • Github Actions Workflow cho repo Laravel

    name: Laravel Deploy

on:
    push:
        branches:
            - develop
    pull_request:
        branches:
            - develop

jobs:
    build:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        steps:
            - uses: actions/checkout@v2

            - name: Executing remote ssh commands
            uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
            with:
                host: ${{ secrets.SERVER_IP }}
                username: ${{ secrets.SERVER_USERNAME }}
                key: ${{ secrets.KEY_SSH }}
                script: |
                    cd /opt/runwaves-api
                    php artisan down
                    git pull origin develop
                    php artisan optimize:clear
                    composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
                    php artisan optimize
                    php artisan up

node.html:
What is Authentication?

Authentication is the process of identifying users that request access to a system, network, or device. Access control often determines user identity according to credentials like username and password. Other authentication technologies like biometrics and authentication apps are also used to authenticate user identity.

Authentication Types

Basic Authentication

Session Based Authentication

Token Based Authentication

JWT Authentication

OAuth ‚Äî Open Authorization

SSO ‚Äî Single Sign On

Reference: https://roadmap.sh
